column5: Has anyone fished here, and can you let me know of any good walleye and pike spots. Going up there in late May of 2002. Thanks to all who answer. JJ
>Has anyone fished here, and can you let me know of any good >walleye and pike spots. Going up there in late May of 2002. >Thanks to all who answer. JJ What is lodge you are going to?

You made a great choice in going to the gouin reservoir. I remember that walleyes are caught by the hundreads there as well as some large pike but if I remember the smallies over 4 lbs were plenty as well. May is a great time to go there as well but not sure if the bass will be in season that early in the year.Catch a big one this fallKeep releasing them allRichard Collinhttp://www.trophymuskiecharters.com

We did a houseboat trip, fly-in and drive in and camping. All trips have been excellent. Oasis du Gouin was our outfitter. It is by far the best walleye fishery I have ever been on. Jigs and crawlers and rapallas worked well. The only draw back is the drive from Akron, Ohio and the bouncy dirt roads. Drop a line if you have any questions. Good luck.
